屈原.definition: Qu Yuan (340-278 BC), famous Warring States statesman and poet, author of Sorrow at Parting 離騷|离骚 Lisao in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞

屈原祠.definition: Qu Yuan memorial temple on the Miluo river 汨羅江|汨罗江 at Yueyang 岳陽市|岳阳市, Hunan

屈原紀念館.definition: Qu Yuan Memorial Hall in Zigui county 秭歸縣|秭归县[Zi3 gui1 Xian4], Hubei, built in 1982 and a major tourist attraction since then

屈從.definition: to submit; to yield; to bow to sb's will

屈折語.definition: to inflect (in grammar); to decline; to conjugate

屈指可數.definition: lit. can be counted on one's fingers (idiom); fig. very few

屈撓.definition: to surrender; to yield; to flex

屈服.definition: to surrender; to succumb; to yield; (as a transitive verb) to defeat; to prevail over

屈頭蛋.definition: see 鴨仔蛋|鸭仔蛋[ya1 zi3 dan4]

屈體.definition: to bend at the waist; (fig.) to bow to; (diving) pike position
